mapper.insert: insert into customer(name, telephone, turnover, consumption_amount, number_winners, recharge_points, consumption_points, residual_integral, code, is_mail, is_lottery, is_del) values (#{name}, #{telephone}, #{turnover}, #{consumptionAmount}, #{numberWinners}, #{rechargePoints}, #{consumptionPoints}, #{residualIntegral}, #{code}, #{isMail}, #{isLottery}, #{isDel})
